awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: As the fiercely dedicated general practitioner who tries to help the sick, the poor and the unfortunate in his decrepit neighborhood, Paul Muni is the testy old man who faces life without compromise and David Wayne is the troubled television producer fighting to preserve his career.
plot: An aspiring journalist's story of his aged uncle doctor leads to the uncle's life being profiled on TV.
title: The Last Angry Man
